name: Starborne: Frontiers
summary: Take to the stars in an epic space adventure set in the distant future. Discover the dark secrets of the 10 warring factions, from the immortal Children of the Everliving to the lawless Marauders; they all have one goal: to dominate the galaxy. As a commander, you will face threats from all across the galaxy. Is your fleet ready for the challenge? Find out in this stellar tactical gacha game, where you'll test your strategy skills in exhilarating starship battles.
